comment: All is well ! Missiles launched from Iran at two military bases located in Iraq . Assessment of casualties & damages taking place now . So far , so good ! We have the most powerful and well equipped military anywhere in the world , by far ! I will be making a statement tomorrow morning .

                                    :op1 "Iraq")))))
      :snt3 (a2 / assess-01

                  :op1 (c3 / casualty)
                  :op2 (d / damages-02))
            :time (n3 / now))
      :snt4 (g / good-04

                  :ARG0 (w2 / we)
                  :ARG1 (m4 / military

                              :ARG3 (m5 / most)
                              :ARG5 (m6 / military
                                    :location (a4 / anywhere
                                          :location (w3 / world))))
                        :ARG1-of (e / equip-01
                              :ARG1-of (w4 / well-09))
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG2 p
                              :ARG3 (m7 / most)
                              :ARG5 m6))
                  :time (s / so-far))
            :snt5 (s2 / state-01

                  :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :dayperiod (m8 / morning)
                        :mod (t / tomorrow)))))
